thread.title: BJP gains significant edge in Bihar, say punters
thread.title_full: BJP gains significant edge in Bihar, say punters

author: Tehelka Web Desk
title: BJP gains significant edge in Bihar, say punters
text:
Comment 
What has started as a “ tense contest” with Nitish-Lalu and Congress grand alliance having a marginal edge, the BJP , according to the punters, has gained significant ground thanks to the solid preparations made by president Amit Shah in Bihar to ensure the saffron party’s victory in the Bihar polls. This was made nearly possible in a record time of more than 15 days. 
Within a fortnight of entering the “tense contest, the Bharatiya Janata Party -led National Democratic Alliance has gained significant ground in the “tense contest”, according to punters.
